brief.content-text:
The diagram compares Physical Layer standards and upper layer standards. The top portion of the Data Link Layer and the layers above it are implemented in software. The bottom portion of the Data Link Layer and the Physical Layer are implemented in hardware.

TCP/IP standards are set by the IETF. Physical Layer standards are set by I S O, ANSI, IEEE, I T U, EI A/T IA, and the FCC.
